channel.title: Ok, Thats it... I need Help with Clients Now. I cant wait any longer
channel.description:
Im pissed because every client i use doesnt work for me! it has this retarded ass error and its getting annoying...
The only clients that work are...
1) Silab Client (Download Version) 2) DrowningScape Client from the download post by DuhPk - DrowningScape Client + Source. It works....
Here is the pic of my error.... PLZ HELP!!!!
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2ylv3iq.jpg[/img]

item.title: Ok, Thats it... I need Help with Clients Now. I cant wait any longer
item.dc:creator: @Pwnage_Sh0w Pwnage Sh0w
item.description:
@Pwnage_Sh0w wrote:

i think it works now but the Gui part is really Egui and its supposed to be all caps… EDUI

Read full topic
item.source: Ok, Thats it... I need Help with Clients Now. I cant wait any longer

item.title: Ok, Thats it... I need Help with Clients Now. I cant wait any longer
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Right click the Run, add this.

@echo off
color 0a
title RunClient
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-jre1.6.0_05-ga-bin.jar Gui

If you get the EGUI, right click it again, and change “Gui” to EGUI.
PAUSE

Read full topic
